bibl.title: The Drunk, the Reformer and the Teacher: Agonistic Poetics and the Construction of Persona in the Comic Poets of the Fifth Century.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the University College London Research Seminar in November 2007. - Pp. 20-26: III. Eupolis the teacher.
BAKOLA Emmanuela, The Drunk, the Reformer and the Teacher: Agonistic Poetics and the Construction of Persona in the Comic Poets of the Fifth Century.
